domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to automobile, spacecraft, aircraft and boat manufacturing

entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

urls.title: WIZZ – Dream more. Live more. Be more.
urls.description: Fly with Europe's greenest ultra-low cost airline. Friendly service, low fares and lots of destinations.

data.text: @SteveChurton @drmahendrapatel @easyJet @Ryanair Hi! We're sorry to hear that you've had this experience with us. Please fill out the complaints form on our official website and the colleagues will look into it for you: https://t.co/F1LYZYRxMV
@jobseeker988 Hi. We're not operating flights to Indonesia.

urls.title: WIZZ – Dream more. Live more. Be more.
urls.description: Fly with Europe's greenest ultra-low cost airline. Friendly service, low fares and lots of destinations.

data.text: @lloydshep @WizzAirUK_W9 Hi there, we advise you to contact us via our Live Chat service which is available for 0-24 hours. Here is the link: https://t.co/th7YMTfpmi

urls.title: WIZZ – Dream more. Live more. Be more.
urls.description: Fly with Europe's greenest ultra-low cost airline. Friendly service, low fares and lots of destinations.

data.text: @alessan54022140 Hi there! Our colleagues make sure to reply in the 30 days timeframe after your last sent email. If you didn't receive any e-mails within this timeframe, please reach via our live chat channel and our colleagues will inform you. https://t.co/th7YMTeRwK

data.text: @buddhaotboard Hi. If you haven't received any refund within 14 work days then please contact us via the Live Chat or Call Centre, so we can look into this for you: https://t.co/th7YMTeRwK

data.text: @harmander_rana Hi! Thank you for the route suggestion, we'll keep it in mind for the future. Please keep an eye on our official website for updates: https://t.co/KmRGHF6pwz

@Burnzie22 @WizzAirUK_W9 Hi! You can only take a foldable stroller free of charge. If you'd like to take a cot too then you need to purchase a checked-in bag in your reservation. Thank you for the understanding.

@gozderekk Hi. Due to a busy summer season there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be answered and processed as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience and understanding with this.
@Ohhhyabeauty_19 If you type "chat with an agent" to Amelia then she'll connect you to an available person as soon as possible.
